original_text: His clothes became very white; they were shining. They were a brighter white than anyone on earth could wash them.
korean_text: 그 옷이 광채가 나며 세상에서 빨래하는 자가 그렇게 희게 할 수 없을 만큼 매우 희어졌더라

sentences.original_text: than anyone on earth could wash them
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 있는 그 어떤 사람도 빨 수 있는 것보다
